chapters.description: Learn the structure and elements of HTML.
chapters.goal: Build a simple webpage with basic HTML elements.
chapters.mini_project: Create a personal landing page with sections for about, skills, and projects.

chapters.description: Master CSS selectors, properties, and techniques for styling web pages.
chapters.goal: Style the landing page created in the previous chapter.
chapters.mini_project: Design a visually appealing navigation bar and apply it to the landing page.

chapters.description: Learn JavaScript syntax, variables, data types, operators, and control flow.
chapters.goal: Add interactive elements to the landing page using JavaScript.
chapters.mini_project: Implement a simple form validation on the landing page.

chapters.description: Understand React components, JSX, props, state, and lifecycle methods.
chapters.goal: Build a basic React application with multiple components.
chapters.mini_project: Create a simple todo list application using React components.

chapters.description: Learn about React hooks like useState, useEffect, and useContext for managing state and side effects.
chapters.goal: Refactor the todo list application using hooks for improved state management.
chapters.mini_project: Add user authentication functionality to the todo list application using a simple state management solution.

chapters.description: Implement navigation and routing in React applications using libraries like React Router.
chapters.goal: Create multiple pages and navigate between them using React Router.
chapters.mini_project: Integrate React Router into the todo list application to create separate pages for adding, editing, and deleting tasks.

chapters.description: Learn how to fetch data from APIs and display it in React applications.
chapters.goal: Build a weather app that fetches data from a weather API.
chapters.mini_project: Create a news app that fetches and displays news articles from a public API.

chapters.description: Understand different testing techniques for React applications and learn to write unit and integration tests.
chapters.goal: Write unit tests for the weather app and news app.
chapters.mini_project: Implement end-to-end testing for the news app using a testing framework like Cypress.

chapters.description: Learn how to deploy React applications to various hosting platforms.
chapters.goal: Deploy the news app to a cloud hosting platform like Netlify or Vercel.
chapters.mini_project: Set up continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) for the deployed news app.

roadmap.module: Frontend Development Best Practices and Portfolio Building

chapters.description: Learn best practices for writing clean, readable, and maintainable code.
chapters.goal: Refactor the deployed news app to follow best coding practices.
chapters.mini_project: Write documentation for the news app's codebase.

chapters.description: Understand techniques for optimizing React application performance.
chapters.goal: Improve the loading speed and responsiveness of the news app.
chapters.mini_project: Implement lazy loading for components in the news app.

chapters.description: Build a portfolio website to showcase your skills and projects.
chapters.goal: Create a professional portfolio website highlighting your React projects.
chapters.mini_project: Design and develop a portfolio website showcasing the news app and other React projects.
